horse: May have a saddle or bridle
dog: Tail (varies in length and shape depending on breed)
Snout/muzzle (different lengths and shapes depending on breed)
Collar or tags (may be visible on neck)
Behaviors such as wagging tail, barking, or playful stance
guitar: a bridge to anchor the strings
tuning knobs for adjusting string tension
giraffe: These are some useful visual features to distinguish a giraffe in a photo:
Tallest terrestrial animal with long neck and legs
Distinctive coat pattern with patches or spots
Ossicones (horn-like structures) on top of the head
Tail with a tuft of hair at the end
house: Structural features such as walls, windows, doors, and a roof
Surrounding landscape or environment, such as a yard, driveway, or trees
Architectural style or design elements, like the shape of the roof, type of siding, or decorative details
Presence of other structures or buildings nearby
Smoke coming out of a chimney, if applicable
Lighting fixtures such as porch lights or windows that appear illuminated
